Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
com.fms.Controller.CommentController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/api/v1/comment") public class CommentController extends Object
Author:
FMS

Controller rest pour les points d'access des comment url localhost:8181/pilotage_contrat/api/v1/comment
